mapper.insert: INSERT INTO om_item_price( id, customer_no, sku_code, channel, price_type, purchase_multiple, sale_multiple, unit, auxiliary_unit, discount, tax_price, price, effective_time, expired_time, is_enable, is_allow_adjustment, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, org_id, convert_ratio, tax_rate, audit_status, audit_date, auditor, logistics_muq_type, owner_code ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{customerNo}, #{skuCode}, #{channel}, #{priceType}, #{purchaseMultiple}, #{saleMultiple}, #{unit}, #{auxiliaryUnit}, #{discount}, #{taxPrice}, #{price}, #{effectiveTime}, #{expirationTime}, #{isEnable}, #{isAllowAdjustment}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{orgId}, #{convertRatio}, #{taxRate}, #{auditStatus}, #{auditDate}, #{auditor}, #{logisticsMuqType}, #{ownerCode} )
mapper.update: UPDATE om_item_price SET customer_no = #{customerNo}, sku_code = #{skuCode}, channel = #{channel}, price_type = #{priceType}, purchase_multiple = #{purchaseMultiple}, sale_multiple = #{saleMultiple}, unit = #{unit}, auxiliary_unit = #{auxiliaryUnit}, discount = #{discount}, tax_price = #{taxPrice}, price = #{price}, effective_time = #{effectiveTime}, expired_time = #{expirationTime}, is_enable = #{isEnable}, is_allow_adjustment = #{isAllowAdjustment}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, org_id = #{orgId}, convert_ratio = #{convertRatio}, tax_rate = #{taxRate}, audit_status = #{auditStatus}, audit_date = #{auditDate}, auditor = #{auditor}, logistics_muq_type = #{logisticsMuqType}, owner_code = #{ownerCode} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE om_item_price SET del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_DELETE} WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT o.ebcu_name_cn AS "ownerName", b.ebcu_name_cn AS "customerName", c.sku_name AS "skuName", c.spec AS "spec",
FROM om_item_price a LEFT JOIN om_customer b ON a.customer_no = b.ebcu_customer_no AND a.org_id = b.org_id LEFT JOIN om_customer o ON a.owner_code = o.ebcu_customer_no AND a.org_id = o.org_id LEFT JOIN om_item c ON a.owner_code = c.owner_code AND a.sku_code = c.sku_code AND a.org_id = c.org_id WHERE a.id = #{id}
